thread.title: IntelePeer Announces New Senior Vice President of Business Development

author: cnbc.com
title: IntelePeer Announces New Senior Vice President of Business Development
text:
SAN MATEO, Calif., May 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IntelePeer, a leading provider of cloud-based communication services and applications, announced today that Frank Lauria has joined the Company as its Senior Vice President of Business Development.
Lauria will lead the company's efforts to create integrated offerings and joint go-to-market relationships with leading technology providers. IntelePeer’s multi-channel communications platform is trusted by many of the world’s most respected brands to deliver the state-of-the-art customer experience and business communications. In this new role, Lauria will work with technology partners to deliver the next generation of communications and customer experience through integrated artificial intelligence, powerful automation, machine learning, deep insights, IoT, and more. These new offerings will create competitive advantages and new revenue opportunities for IntelePeer’s customers and partners.
“I am excited to join the IntelePeer team,” said Lauria. “With our current products and services, upcoming product roadmap, and energized and dedicated team, IntelePeer is poised to change the communications space, making it easier for businesses to engage with their customers.”
Lauria recently led Sales, Marketing, and Business Development with CSF Corporation. Prior to CSF Corporation, Lauria held sales, marketing, and operational leadership positions with CommTech Corporation, Synchronoss, Nortel, ADC Telecom, and Comverse Technologies.
"I am pleased to welcome Frank Lauria to IntelePeer," said Frank Fawzi, IntelePeer’s Chief Executive Officer. "Frank's industry expertise and leadership in developing strong strategic relationships will further advance our vision of delivering innovative solutions that enable our partners and customers to build world class customer experiences and improve business processes.”
About IntelePeer
IntelePeer delivers ready to use, cloud-based, multi-channel business communications you can build on with voice and messaging applications via multiple connection options, backed by an award-winning support team and disaster avoidance solutions. Partners and companies of any size can leverage our innovative solutions to create more effective customer interactions and improve business processes.
